name: StLinkP
description: Flashloader for some stm32 CPU.  Using this application you can program stm32 CPU by ST-Link programmer.  Your device must support USB-OTG  Supported stm32 family - STM32F051x4/F051x6/F051x8/F030x8 - STM32F10xx Medium-density - STM32L100x8/L15xx8 - STM32F301x4-x6-x8/F302x4-x6-x8/F318xx - STM32F401xE - STM32F405xx/407xx - STM32F415xx/417xx - STM32L43x - STM32G0x1  Supported firmware file format - Intel Hex - Raw binary
